articles.title: Keeler: When Boise State punched Buffs in the mouth, CU’s Tristan da Silva punched back. Are Florida Gators ready for NCAA Tournament “dawg” fight? - The Denver Post
articles.description: In a game with more dead bunnies than Elmer Fudd’s daydreams, Tristan da Silva couldn’t stop hopping. Or popping.
articles.content:
DAYTON, Ohio — In a game with more dead bunnies than Elmer Fudd’s daydreams, Tristan da Silva couldn’t stop hopping. Or popping.
